name: Pola-rized
description:
Time flows like the wind, and going back to where you once were is a trip where past and present walk together. But that journey is not always easy. What to feel when your safe place doesn't fit you anymore?

A first-person narrative game where the goal is to find a time capsule hidden way back earlier, by going through puzzles to take pictures in order to find the special time capsule map, while dealing with memories and emotions

Controls:

WASD - Move

E - Take Picture

Tab - Open Sketchbook

Mouse - Look around
